title: Sweet Thai Salmon
ingredients: ['2 salmon fillets', '400g can of coconut milk', '3 tbs of good quality thai chilli dipping sauce (or to taste)', '2 spring onions finely sliced', '3 medium sized mushrooms finely sliced', '1/2 tbs fresh parsley, finely chopped', '1/2 tbs fresh basil, finely chopped', 'Ground black pepper to taste', '2 packs of straight to wok noodles']
